metadata.title: CVE-2024-26920 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:tracing/trigger: Fix to return error if failed to alloc snapshot Fixregister_snapshot_trigger() to return error code if it failed to allocate asnapshot instead of 0 (success). Unless that, it will register snapshottrigger without an error.
